description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              We are looking for a brilliant and personable full-time .NET Developer to be part of a talented core technical team who are passionate about building and selling a revolutionary new software application.
              

              Your role:
              
              You will be part of the software product development team.
              
              •	You will be responsible for development of key software components.
              
              •	You will have the special blend of creativity and logic that makes an excellent software developer, and apply those skills in creating the next generation of enterprise and country scale identity and security technology.
              
              •	You will be broadly involved in all aspects of building a great web site, web based products and a great business, from design and development, to implementation, in a team environment.
              
              •	Strong software development skills including modeling and development practices.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              You:
              
              •	Have a proven track record delivering high quality results.
              
              •	Have a talent for understanding customer challenges and developing innovative solutions.
              
              •	Have a passion to build great software.
              

              Skills, Qualifications and Experience:
              
              •	Proficiency in C#, Visual Studio.Net, MS SQL and related technologies:
              
              1. Technologies: .NET, Web Services, RESTful/Json
              
              2. Languages/Formats: C#, JavaScript, T-SQL, HTML, CSS, XML, Json
              
              3. Architecture: SaaS, Multi-tier architecture design.
              
              4. Web development: ASP.NET, MVC.
              
              5. Database: MS SQL Server and related technologies,
              
              6. OO Design and Development
              

              A big plus:
              
              o	Proficiency in .NETCORE Java, C++,NodeJS, Python,  NoSQL, Security and Cryptography
              
              o	Strong experience in Large system deign and implementation with skills about High availability and Scalibility
              
              •	Demonstrated software development excellence or 3+ years software development and engineering, IT consulting, professional services and/or enterprise software development experience.
              
              •	Intermediate English in writing
              
              •	Effective communication and teamwork.
              
              •	The willingness to learn, effort and ability to do so rapidly, and handle pressure in a fast paced environment.BS, MS or PhD in computer science, or equivalent.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Competitive salary and bonus
               







                Social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance according to Labor Laws
               







                Opportunities to be trained in the professional environment to maximize your potential
